QuestData.Title: Soulbound
QuestData.Description:
Ya did well with me tasks. I be thinkin' ya show promise. Ya might be worthy of a deal.
Very well, I pledge ta lend ya me powers ta use against ya foes. In exchange, ya be sendin' one million souls ta Bwonsamdi! No need ta look shocked, ya be plenty capable of doing dis.
Come, meet with me at da Court of Spirits. Dere, we will finalize our agreement.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Bwonsamdi in the Court of Spirits and complete the ritual.
